name: Lab Breakout (KublaiKhan)
description: This is my first attempt making a puzzle game in Unity. In Lab Breakout you play as a lost scientist trying to escape a lab he is stuck in using buttons that manipulate doors and other parts of different rooms. Use the WASD or arrow keys to move and when in front of a button which looks like a white square with a number on it press z to manipulate it's values.
